data.name: Inferno - Beyond the 7th Circle Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Original Soundtrack from Inferno - Beyond the 7th Circle is a mix of heavy metal and progressive rock. The tracks are heavily influenced by the soundtracks from 70s Italian horror movies (Goblin, Fabio Frizzi).
data.about_the_game: The Original Soundtrack from Inferno - Beyond the 7th Circle is a mix of heavy metal and progressive rock. The tracks are heavily influenced by the soundtracks from 70s Italian horror movies (Goblin, Fabio Frizzi).
data.short_description: The Original Soundtrack from Inferno - Beyond the 7th Circle is a mix of heavy metal and progressive rock. The tracks are heavily influenced by the soundtracks from 70s Italian horror movies (Goblin, Fabio Frizzi).
